metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8377 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Tcpreplay 4.3.1. A NULL pointer dereferenceoccurred in the function get_ipv6_l4proto() located at get.c. This can betriggered by sending a crafted pcap file to the tcpreplay-edit binary. Itallows an attacker to cause a Denial of Service (Segmentation fault) orpossibly have unspecified other impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8377` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.3.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.1-2').
